CodeList.Name: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Questionnaire Test Name

Description.TranslatedText: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format test name.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do moderate physical activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Days Moderate Physical Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you do vigorous physical activities?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Days Vigorous Physical Activities

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - During the last 7 days, on how many days did you walk for at least 10 minutes at a time?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Days Walk at Least 10 Minutes

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - How much time did you usually spend doing moderate physical activities on one of those days?: Hours per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Moderate Physical Hours per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - How much time did you usually spend doing moderate physical activities on one of those days?: Minutes per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Moderate Physical Minutes per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - During the last 7 days, how much time did you usually spend sitting on a weekday?: Hours per weekday.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Sitting Hours per Weekday

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - During the last 7 days, how much time did you usually spend sitting on a weekday?: Minutes per weekday.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Sitting Minutes per Weekday

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - What is the total amount of time you spent over the last 7 days doing moderate physical activities?: Hours per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Total Moderate Hours per Week

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - What is the total amount of time you spent over the last 7 days doing moderate physical activities?: Minutes per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Total Moderate Minutes per Week

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - What is the total amount of time you spent sitting last Wednesday?: Hours on Wednesday.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Total Sitting Hours on Wednesday

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - What is the total amount of time you spent sitting last Wednesday?: Minutes on Wednesday.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Total Sitting Minutes on Wednesday

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - How much time in total would you spend over the last 7 days doing vigorous physical activities?: Hours per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Total Vigorous Hours per Week

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - How much time in total would you spend over the last 7 days doing vigorous physical activities?: Minutes per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Total Vigorous Minutes per Week

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - What is the total amount of time you spent walking over the last 7 days?: Hours per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Total Walking Hours per Week

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - What is the total amount of time you spent walking over the last 7 days?: Minutes per week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Total Walking Minutes per Week

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - How much time did you usually spend doing vigorous physical activities on one of those days?: Hours per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Vigorous Physical Hours per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - How much time did you usually spend doing vigorous physical activities on one of those days?: Minutes per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Vigorous Physical Minutes per Day

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: International Physical Activity Questionnaire (August 2002) - Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format - How much time did you usually spend walking on one of those days?: Hours per day.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: IPAQ Short Last 7 Days Telephone Format Version - Walking Hours per Day
